item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a passionate mobile developer. I graduated in Computer Science from École Polytechnique and Télécom ParisTech in 2010. I am interested in numerous topics, from cross-platform mobile development to image processing and computer vision (I also hold a master’s degree in medical imaging from Université Pierre et Marie Curie). Experience Late 2016 - Lead Mobile Developer (iOS, Android) at Baatch Baatch is a new startup whose team is composed of talented people.
